text: Sorrowful Jones also known as Damon Runyon's Sorrowful Jones is a 1949 American comedy movie directed by Sidney Lanfield and starring Lucille Ball, Bob Hope, Bruce Cabot, William Demarest. It is a remake of the 1934 movie Little Miss Marker and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1949 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Lanfield
title: Sorrowful Jones
